Module Slope.ECS
Package org.lucasstarsz.slope.component

Class ECSComponentManager

java.lang.Object
org.lucasstarsz.slope.component.ECSComponentManager
public class ECSComponentManager
extends java.lang.Object
The manager of components and component types.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ECSComponentManager​(int maxEntityCount)
    Constructs a component manager with the specified maximum entity count.

  • Constructor Details

    • ECSComponentManager

      public ECSComponentManager​(int maxEntityCount)
      Constructs a component manager with the specified maximum entity count.
      Parameters:
      maxEntityCount - The maximum amount of entities allowed within the component manager.

  • Method Details

    • registerComponent

      public <T extends IComponent> void registerComponent​(java.lang.Class<T> componentClass)
      Registers the specified class as a possible component type within the ECS.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the component class to be registered. Uses of T must implement IComponent.
      Parameters:
      componentClass - The class of the component type.

    • getComponentType

      public <T extends IComponent> int getComponentType​(java.lang.Class<T> componentClass)
      Gets the component type of the specified component class.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the component class to get the type for. Uses of T must implement IComponent.
      Parameters:
      componentClass - The class of the component type.
      Returns:
      The type of the specified component class.

    • addComponent

      public <T extends IComponent> void addComponent​(int entity, T component)
      Adds the specified component to the specified entity's component array.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the component to be added. Uses of T must implement IComponent.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to add the component to.
      component - The component to add.

    • removeComponent

      public <T extends IComponent> void removeComponent​(int entity, java.lang.Class<T> componentClass)
      Remove a component from the array for an entity.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the component to be removed. Uses of T must implement IComponent.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to remove a component from.
      componentClass - The class of the component to remove.

    • getComponent

      public <T extends IComponent> T getComponent​(int entity, java.lang.Class<T> componentClass)
      Gets the component from the array for an entity.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the component to get. Uses of T must implement IComponent.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to get a component from.
      componentClass - The class of the component to get.
      Returns:
      The component from the array for an entity.

    • entityDestroyed

      public void entityDestroyed​(int entity)
      Notifies each component array that an entity has been destroyed. If it has a component for that entity, that component will be removed.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity being destroyed.

    • getRegisteredComponentCount

      public int getRegisteredComponentCount()
      Gets the number of registered component types.
      Returns:
      The number of registered component types.
